message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think is fair. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
While I appreciate your offer, $1100000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.  This price is fair considering your value for it and my budget.
I understand that $950000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.
